body.name: [Electric Focus] 18K Native 1080P Mini Bluetooth Projector 4K Support, 5G WiFi FULL HD 1080P Portable Video Projector Max 300” Display |ZOOM 50%|, Outdoor Movie Projector for HDMI/USB/AV/TV Stick/PS4
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 10 mins
features: 👍【2024 Early Release! Super Compact, Full-Featured, Native 1080P Brightness Boost!】The latest X7 mini projector is now available for early release! The X7 portable projector breaks through size and functionality norms, distinguishing itself from traditional products with updates of 18K brightness, Native 1080P, 2.4G+5GWIFI, 5.0 Bluetooth, short-distance projection, ± 60° vertical keystone correction, and 50% zoom! The 80% increased brightness translates a 2.5x pixel count and 2x color boost!

👍【Instant Connection, High-Speed 5G&2.4GWIFI, Bluetooth 5.0】As the industry's first WiFi-enabled native 1080p mini projector, X7 projector comes equipped with the latest 2.4G or ultra-fast 5G WiFi connectivity. No need for cables—quickly connect to IOS, Android, and Windows devices through WiFi for wireless projection. Powerful 5G WiFi capabilities reduce latency by 60%, ensuring stable and faster transmission! Its HiFi speakers reproduces a lifelike audio without the need for external speaker.

👍【Electric Focus, 300” Screen, 50% Zoom Function, Ceiling Projection】X7 projector with wifi and bluetooth adapted with the latest digital focus and ±60° vertical keystone. You can adjust the focus and projection image more convenient and accurate. X7 4K mini projector can project max 300” display and features up to 50% zoom function. You easily adjust screen size from 100% to 50% without moving the projector. You can project onto the walls and ceilings, creating a cozy home theater environment!

👍【Wide Compatibility+Eye Protection Design】In addition to hassle-free streaming with Miracast, iOS, DLNA, and Airplay connectivity, the outdoor projector also features HDMI/AV/USB/ input ports, compatible with laptops/TV stick/smartphones/USB drive/DVD players, and various peripherals such as PS3/PS4/external speakers. Whether you're presenting, gaming, or watching your favorite shows, this projector caters to your streaming needs with vibrant colors and brightness, making every detail pop.

👍【Revolutionary Ultra-Short Throw and Ceiling Projection】Break free from traditional constraints with the X7, projecting a massive 300-inch screen. Achieve a minimum projection size of 33 inches, and with a mere 0.9m projection distance, enjoy large-screen visuals even in limited spaces. Benefit from a lamp life of 50,000 hours, ensuring that your projector remains a reliable companion for countless hours of entertainment, providing you with an enduring and exceptional viewing experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2024 Early Release! Super Compact, Full-Featured, Native 1080P Brightness Boost!

Introducing the X7 Mini Projector: Your Gateway to Ultimate Entertainment! Early 2024 Release! Unleash Innovation with Enhanced Features! Step into the future of home entertainment with the X7 Mini Projector, an advanced and compact marvel designed to redefine your viewing experience. Packed with cutting-edge technology and boasting an early release for 2024, this projector goes beyond the ordinary, delivering a host of features that set it apart from the rest. Key Features: * Exceptional Brightness: With a staggering 18000LM brightness, the X7 elevates your visuals, offering 2.5 times more pixels and doubling the color spectrum for a truly vivid and immersive display. * Versatile Connectivity: Seamlessly connect to iOS, Android, and Windows devices through the latest 2.4G or ultra-fast 5G WiFi. Bluetooth 5.3 ensures instant wireless pairing with your favorite headphones or speakers. * Ultra-Short Throw & Massive Screen: Experience a cinematic spectacle with a 300-inch projection, thanks to the industry-first ultra-short throw feature. The 50% zoom function lets you customize the screen size effortlessly. * Smart Keystone Correction: Perfectly align your visuals with ±60 degrees vertical keystone correction, ensuring a distortion-free and crisp image, no matter where you set up. * Hi-Fi Audio Experience: Immerse yourself in premium audio with the built-in 15W Hi-Fi speakers, faithfully reproducing three-dimensional soundscapes without the need for external speakers. * Dustproof & Cooling System: Our sealed optical engine and detachable dust filter protect against dust, while the advanced cooling system ensures optimal performance and longevity.

Sainyer 2024 Latest Upgrade 18K Ultra HD Native 1080P Mini Projector! Previous page Next page Breaking size and functionality barriers, X7 boasts 18K brightness, 2.4G+5GWIFI, 5.0 Bluetooth, electric focus, short-distance projection, ±60° vertical keystone, 50% ZOOM, and more. Enjoy a 80% increase in brightness, 2.5 times more pixels, 2 times richer colors, enhanced speed and extended range!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is an easy to use projector, we just plugged in our Fire Stick and everything worked great! easy to set up and navigate. Sound is enough for a small room, which we have, the image quality is stunning. The colors are vibrant, and the picture is crystal clear, even when projecting onto a large screen.This projector features advanced motorized focus, so visuals look natural and have beautiful pixels, making it simple to use for new projector users. This feature makes this projector more stable, convenient, and easier for beginners to operate.It is also very lightweight and easy to carry over if you are vacationing.Overall, I would highly recommend this projector to anyone looking for a high-quality projector at an affordable price. It truly delivers an incredible movie-watching experience in the comfort of your own home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Unbeatable Compact Projector with Stunning Features
reviews.reviewText: No joke, this thing is awesome! It really is. I've loved projectors for as long as I could remember and have used them for travel, ranging from a portable 480p projector that could fit in your hand, to one used for a small business on stage, to outdoor, and as primary in my bedroom. There's always been one issue.. compact and/or budget friendly projectors are usually limited to 720p native resolution. Many products will say 1080p ready or something, but make sure to look at their native resolution in the product details because it will be lower. What I like about compact projectors is they don't take up much space are easy to mount (light weight). What I mean by this is they are easy to mount to the ceiling without a crazy or expensive mount, are easy to setup, and look nice.This thing goes beyond that. It's the most elegant projector I have ever used (and have seen at this price point). The thing is beautiful, supports NATIVE 1080p, compact, easy to setup, has great native sound (but you can add additional audio device, through hardwire or blutooth, etc). I can't say enough about it, this is my favorite projector to date. I highly recommend it.Again, honestly, I can't express how impressed I am with the Native 1080P Mini Bluetooth Projector. As a long-time projector enthusiast, I've experienced various models, but this one is a game-changer. The elegance, functionality, and outstanding features make it my favorite projector to date.Recommendation:The Native 1080P Mini Bluetooth Projector is a must-have for anyone seeking an unbeatable combination of elegance, functionality, and advanced features. Whether you're setting up a home theater or a business presentation, this projector delivers an exceptional viewing experience. Highly recommended!Details:I've used various projectors over the years, but the Native 1080P Mini Bluetooth Projector truly stands out. Its native 1080p resolution brings a level of clarity and detail that sets it apart from others in its class. The compact design, coupled with the elegant aesthetics, makes it not just a functional device but also a piece of technology that enhances any space.Setting up the projector is a breeze (which is not always the case), thanks to its focus, keystoning, options, connectivity, and intuitive software. The inclusion of WiFi connectivity, especially 5G, ensures quick and stable wireless projection without the hassle of cables. The HiFi speakers provide great audio, eliminating the need for external speakers.Whether you're watching movies, playing games, or giving presentations, this projector caters to all your needs. The wide compatibility with various devices and input ports adds to its versatility and ease of useIn conclusion, the Native 1080P Mini Bluetooth Projector is a standout product in its category. Its unbeatable combination of features, true native resolution, and elegant design make it a top choice for anyone in need of a high-quality, compact projector. I highly recommend it to fellow projector enthusiasts and anyone looking to elevate their viewing experience.TL;DR:I would recommend this projector!Pros:• True Native 1080P Resolution: Unlike many compact projectors claiming 1080p readiness, this one stands out with its native 1080p resolution, providing unparalleled clarity and detail.• Super Compact Design: The projector is not only compact but also beautifully designed. Its lightweight construction makes it easy to mount on the ceiling without the need for a complicated or expensive mount.• Impressive Brightness and Color Boost: Boasting 18K brightness and a 2x color boost, the visuals are vibrant and stunning. The 80% increased brightness translates into a 2.5x pixel count, ensuring a visually immersive experience.• High-Speed Connectivity: The industry's first WiFi-enabled native 1080p mini projector, the X7, offers high-speed 5G and 2.4G WiFi connectivity. This eliminates the need for cables, allowing quick and seamless connections to iOS, Android, and Windows devices for wireless projection.• Versatile Projection Options: With electric focus, a 300-inch screen capability, 50% zoom function, and ±60° vertical keystone correction, this projector adapts to various environments. It supports ceiling projection and ultra-short throw, providing flexibility in screen placement.• Wide Compatibility: Beyond wireless streaming capabilities, the projector offers multiple input ports for HDMI, AV, USB, making it compatible with various devices such as laptops, TV sticks, smartphones, and more.• Connectivity: The projector boasts a broad range of connectivity with its Miracast, iOS, DLNA, and Airplay. It caters to diverse needs, whether you're presenting, gaming, or enjoying your favorite shows.Cons:• No notable drawbacks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good Product and Value for money
reviews.reviewText: The product is really good one. Clarity is very well. It is not so big, so can carry easily. Speciality is auto focus. it is very convinient. User interface is easy to handle, and looks really well, and simple. The product also looks really simple and standard. Quality of product is very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First one was DOA
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never owned a projector before so I didn’t want to buy one with a lot of options that I would never use. I liked that this has the bare minimum for my planned use. It started off badly. The first one I got was dead on arrival. I popped open the filter and it was dirty so it must have been a return. Amazon shipped me another a day later but I was already shopping for a replacement brand. It annoyed me that I had to go return the first one. The second one seems to be fine. If this one fails soon I’m not going to be out too much money if they won’t exchange it again. I’m projecting onto the ceiling and it seems to be pretty clear using a 4K streaming stick. I just have to have it low to the ground if I want a giant projection because I don’t have very high ceilings. I also had to buy a stand because it can’t rest on its back according to manual and because of the streaming stick. I’ve connected to the unit using Bluetooth but I’ve been mostly using the aux cable with earbuds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Crisp, and QUIET
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m a fan of using projectors instead of LCD screens (why not have a humungous screen for cheap, and no bulk), so I have owned my fair share of other projectors to compare this to.Pros:First off, this thing is stylish — almost an Apple product kind of look and feel. Compared to other projectors I’ve had, this is FAR superior in the aesthetics category.The image quality is more crisp than my previous one of around the same price, and a tad brighter. The difference is noticeable.I mostly just use HDMI, but the wifi / smart capabilities are nice to have. Remote focus is very convenient.Big win: it’s SO QUIET compared to any other projector I’ve used. That’s huge, especially if you plan on using this for home cinema.Cons: no adjustable feet — you’ll have to put this on a tripod or prop it up with books to get the screen in the exact right place.So far that’s it for cons, though. Very happy with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear picture and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Product is a perfect form factor and is not difficult to set up. I was able to plug in my fire stick and stream off of the projector, or mirror my screen from my phone wirelessly. This is the most clear projector I have had at this price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Your phone is better.
reviews.reviewText: Cords are too short. Its really loud. It didnt come with batteries which you physically need to set up. It focuses, but just on the center, so you cant read anything else on the side. Image quality is non existent. I realize i got this on sale, but I honestly cant believe amazon sells this crap. This is borderline fraud.
Me encantó. Excelente costo-beneficio. Relativamente compacto, muy buenas opciones de configuración y la calidad de imagen es bastante decente.

reviews.reviewTitle: 電動フォーカスとズーム機能が便利すぎる
reviews.reviewText: 電動フォーカスと50%ズームに魅力を感じ購入しました。結果は期待通り。長方形の部屋の短辺に本体を設置し、向かいの短辺に映像を映す場合、どうしても映像が大きくなりすぎで困るような場合にこのズーム機能があれば自分の好みのサイズに映像を調整できます。どちらもリモコンから操作でき、電源を切っても記憶されているので、思った以上に便利です。

reviews.reviewTitle: とても綺麗に映ります
reviews.reviewText: とても綺麗に映ります、明るさも十分あるので真っ暗にしなくても使えます、いろいろなメディアも使えるのもいいです。
画質が綺麗で良かったファンの音がでかいのでスピーカーに繋げると良きたまに音が止まるときがある
画質がきれい。軽くて持ち運びが便利。
